channel.title: FLF - God, Law, and Liberty
channel.description: FIGHT LAUGH FEAST PRESENTS SHOWS PROCLAIMING THE LORDSHIP OF CHRIST OVER ALL OF LIFE.
channel.itunes:author: FLF, LLC

item.title: Understanding the Pastor/Politician Discipleship Problem [God, Law, and Liberty]
item.description: A recent interview of an evangelical pastor disappointed by his friend, Virginia Governor Youngkin, signing a same-sex “marriage” bill into law reveals how Christian discipleship falls short, not just with those wanting to hold office, but often with the pastors and policy organizations supporting them. David explains why what may sound and look good to many people in the pews too often turns out so disappointing.
item.author: FLF, LLC
item.itunes:author: FLF, LLC

item.title: A Thesis for What Leads to Enactment of Righteous Civil Laws [God, Law, and Liberty]
item.description: The floundering of the pro-life movement since Roe v. Wade was reversed provides the context for David asking in today’s episode, “What makes for a Christian community, state, or nation, and where in that process do righteous civil laws come into play?” In answer, David offers for consideration a thesis drawn from a re-examination of the Great Commission in Matthew 28.
item.author: FLF, LLC
item.itunes:author: FLF, LLC
